title: 1yel leson 这个是叉子吗？
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:start-standalone]] **标题：**1yel leson 这个是叉子吗？ **作者：**©︎[[*user onthonon]] **创作年份：**2021 [[include :scp-wiki-cn:credit:end-standalone]] +++++ 寿司江似乎在问叉子的事。 [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-14-jwao/lesson1_1small.mp3]] > [[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-40-zqar/%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AF%E3%83%9A%E3%83%B3%EF%BC%BF%E9%96%8B%E3%81%91%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84.jpg]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sushie:** tikiray fOk omedos? > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **寿司江：**这个是叉子吗？ > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sagara:** ne. > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **萨加拉：**不是。 > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > [[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-39-4cfo/%E3%83%95%E3%82%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%82%AF%E3%83%9A%E3%83%B3%EF%BC%BF%E9%96%8B%E3%81%91%E3%81%9F.jpg]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sagara:** tikiray kalam os. > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **萨加拉：**这个是笔。 > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sushie:** fOkoy aomedos? > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **寿司江：**叉子有吗？ > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sagara:** hay, aos. > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **萨加拉：**是的，有。 > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > [[=image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A2853684-3-09ft/7390678896_472ace742c_w.jpg]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sagara:** tikira os. > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **萨加拉：**是这个。 > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sushie:** tikiray fOk omedos? > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **寿司江：**这个是叉子吗？ > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > **Sagara:** hay, ente fOk os. > [[/div]] > [[div style="float:left; width: 45%; padding: 0 2%"]] > [[>]] > **萨加拉：**是的，是前叉。 > [[/>]] > [[/div]] > > ~~~~ [[=]] [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tikira [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 这个 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-29-ekcy/tikira.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] fOk [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 叉子 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-8-p03h/fOk.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] omedo [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] （疑问后缀） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-17-t5p9/omedo.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] ne [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 不是，不对 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-16-dk74/ne.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kalam [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 笔 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-11-krv9/kalam.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] o [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 是，就是 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-17-v4n8/o.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] ao [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 有，存在 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-4-2emf/ao.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] hay [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 是的，对 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-9-uvt8/hay.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] ente [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 前，前面的 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-8-7coe/ente.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] ente fOk [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 前叉 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-7-6c5u/ente_fOk.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/=]] [[# 1-1]] ++++ 1. 主格词尾 主格词尾**-(o)y**就相当于日语中表示主语的「〜は」与「〜が」（汉语无对应助词）。当以辅音结尾的单词后面接有后缀时，中间会加上括号里的元音，以避免出现辅音连缀。 > mori##red|**y**## 马（主格） > kit##red|**oy**## 猫（主格） [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] mori [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 马 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-15-04kh/mori.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kit [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 猫 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-13-h2rz/kit.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-2]] ++++ 2. 动词的词干 在词典中，大多数动词和动词变位后缀都以-o为词尾。动词不带-o的部分叫做**词干**，在动词变位时，每个变位词尾都要加在词干上。 > tah-o 吃 > -id-o 〜了（过去时） [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] taho [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 吃 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-23-tzfu/taho.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-3]] ++++ 3. 「A是B」 构造「A是B」这类句子，要先给A加上主格词尾，然后跟着B，表示“是”的动词**o**放在最后。 > Sagaray beksonkuya o. 萨加拉是贝克逊人。 > > perikoy mane o. 苹果是甜的。 [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] bekson [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 贝克逊 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-7-7qtv/bekson.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kuya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 人 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-14-tbyv/kuya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] beksonkuya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 贝克逊人 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-6-l0h3/beksonkuya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] perik [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 苹果 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-18-47sq/perik.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] mane [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 甜的 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-15-95on/mane.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] 即使不在句末加上助词o，句子也能表示「A是B」。 > Sagaray beksonkuya. 萨加拉是贝克逊人。 > > perikoy mane. 苹果是甜的。 [[# 1-4]] ++++ 4. 「A做〜」 「A做〜」这类句子，和「A是B」一样，也是给A加上主格词尾，动词放在最后。 > Sushibladeoy kerito. 寿司陀螺在转。 [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] Sushiblade [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 寿司陀螺 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-22-q9aa/sushiblade.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kerito [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 转，旋转 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-11-z9ef/kerito.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-5]] ++++ 5. 表示疑问的后缀-omedo 在动词词干或后缀后加上表示疑问的后缀**-omedo**，即可构成疑问句。 > Sagaray beksonkuya ##red|**omedo**##? 萨加拉是贝克逊人吗？ > > perikoy mane ##red|**omedo**##? 苹果是甜的吗？ > > Sushiey keriz##red|**omedo**##? 寿司江在转（陀螺）吗？ [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kerizo [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 使（某物）旋转 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-12-6755/kerizo.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[# 1-6]] ++++ 6. 敬语词尾-os 当需要表达日语中「〜です」或「〜ます」这类丁宁语的含义时（汉语无对应结构），敬语词尾**-os**会加在动词词干或后缀后。该词缀主要加在动词最尾端。 > Sagaray beksonkuya ##red|**os**##. 萨加拉是贝克逊人。（礼貌语气） > > Sushibladeoy kerit##red|**os**##. 寿司陀螺在转。（礼貌语气） > > perikoy mane omed##red|**os**##? 苹果是甜的吗？（礼貌语气） [[# 1-7]] ++++ 7. 指示代词 指示代词有十种。以a结尾的作名词，以e结尾的作形容词。 **tikira**、**tikire**指说话人附近的物和人。 > ##red|**tikira**##y perik os. __这个__是苹果。（礼貌语气） > > ##red|**tikire**## kuyay rosiyakuya. __这__人是俄罗斯人。 [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tikira [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 这个（作名词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-29-ekcy/tikira.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tikire [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 这（作形容词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-28-hjnb/tikire.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] rosiya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 俄罗斯 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-21-icwa/rosiya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] rosiyakuya [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 俄罗斯人 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-20-e4l8/rosiyakuya.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **tisara**、**tisare**指远离说话人的物和人。 > ##red|**tasara**##y sushi os. __那个__是寿司。（礼貌语气） > > ##red|**tisare**## fOkoy kalam os. __那__叉子是笔。（礼貌语气） > @@@@ [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tisara [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 那个（作名词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-34-zmta/tisara.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tisare [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 那（作形容词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-36-x2nu/tisare.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] sushi [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 寿司 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-22-1pn5/sushi.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **timara**、**timare**指双方都心知肚明的人和物、想不起来的人和物，以及不明确的人和物。 > ##red|**timara**##y nao. __那个__没有。 > > ##red|**timare**## kuyay kIlo. __有个__人在说话。 > [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] timara [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[[scp-thingy-ko-j|那个]]]，某个（作名词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-30-28qq/timara.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] timare [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 有个、某个、一些（作形容词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-33-vch3/timare.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] nao [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 没有，不存在 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-16-u4mo/nao.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] kIlo [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 说话，讲话 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-12-mk3m/kIlo.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **tiyana**、**tiyane**指从一系列选项中选出的人或物。 将tiyane放在其他单词前面可以构成一个疑问词。 > ##red|**tiyana**##y yade omedos? __哪个__是喜欢的？（礼貌语气） > > ##red|**tiyane**## fOkoy kalam omedos? __哪个__叉子是笔？（礼貌语气） > @@@@ [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tiyana [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 哪个（作名词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-37-1kjt/tiyana.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tiyane [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 哪（作形容词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-38-wygg/tiyane.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] yade [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 喜欢的 [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-38-bpjm/yade.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[/table]] **tiaka**、**tiake**指没有特定选择项的情况下选择的人或物。将tiake放在其他单词前面可以构成一个疑问词。 > ##red|**tiaka**##y aomedos? __什么__存在？（礼貌语气） > > tisare kuyay ##red|**tiake**## kuya omedos? 那人是__什么__人/谁？（礼貌语气） [[table]] [[row]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[table]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #e1e1e1;" ]] tiaka [[/hcell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] 什么（作名词） [[/cell]] [[cell style="border: 1px solid black"]] [[include :snippets:html5player |type=audio |url=http://scp-jp-storage.wikidot.com/local--files/file:2853684-26-4h2t/tiaka.mp3]] [[/cell]] [[/row]] [[row]] [[hcell style="border: 1px solid black;
